org.jgentleframework.core.handling
Interface DefinitionManager

All Superinterfaces:
IAbstractDefinitionExceptionCatcher, IAnnotationVisitor
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDefinitionController, DefinitionManagerImpl
public interface DefinitionManager
extends IAnnotationVisitor, IAbstractDefinitionExceptionCatcher

DefinitionManager is responsible for Definition management. All Definition in JGentle system will be managed by it. It provides some tools in order to create Definition, validate interpreted annotations, ... and register annotations, or annotation validators. Moreover, it also offers additional features to manage some extension-point in JGentle such as AnnotationPostProcessor, DefinitionPostProcessor, ...

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com
See Also:
IAbstractDefinitionExceptionCatcher

Parameters:

java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - this exception will be thrown if not found the valid annotation class corresponding type T

loadCustomizedDefinition

void loadCustomizedDefinition(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                              java.lang.annotation.Annotation annotation,
                              java.lang.String ID)
Creates a customzied object class Definition

Note:

- In case the given annotation is null and given ID is not existed, this method will automatically create Definition corresponding to given ID.

- In case given ID is null, given annotation is not null, this method will automatically creates Definition corresponding to object class (given Class) and given annotation.

Parameters:
ID - the ID of Definition
clazz - the original object class corresponding to Definition.
annotation - the specified annotation need to be interpreted of given Class.

loadCustomizedDefinition

void loadCustomizedDefinition(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                              java.lang.annotation.Annotation annotation)
Creates a customzied object class Definition

This performance of method is the same as loadCustomizedDefinition(Class, Annotation, String) according to argument IDis null.

Parameters:
clazz - the original object class corresponding to Definition.
annotation - the specified annotation need to be interpreted of given Class.

loadCustomizedDefinition

Definition loadCustomizedDefinition(java.lang.String ID,
                                    java.lang.Object obj,
                                    java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                    java.lang.annotation.Annotation annotation)
Creates a customzied object class Definition

Note: object must be a Field or Method is declared in given class.

Parameters:
ID - the ID of Definition
obj - the given object.
clazz - the original object class corresponding to Definition. In case the Definition according to given ID is not existed, DefinitionManager will automatically create corresponding Definition according to given ID.
annotation - the specified annotation need to be interpreted of given object.
Returns:
Returns previous Definition according to given object if it exists, if not, returns null.

Parameters:
field - the given Field
clazz - the original object class corresponding to Definition. In case the Definition according to this object class is not existed, DefinitionManager will automatically create corresponding Definition.
annotation - the specified annotation need to be interpreted of given Field.
Returns:
Returns previous Definition according to given Field if it exists, if not, returns null.

validateAnnnotation

void validateAnnnotation(java.lang.annotation.Annotation annotation,
                         java.lang.annotation.Annotation[] annoList,
                         java.lang.Object object,
                         java.lang.Class<?> classez)
Validates the interpreting annotation by corresponding registered validator.

Parameters:
annotation - the annotation need to be validated.
annoList - danh sách đối tượng annotation list gốc.
object - the target object that is annotated with given annotation
classez - trong trường hợp object cũng là annotation, thì classez chính là đối tượng gốc mà object đính kèm thông tin lên. Còn nếu không classez sẽ là null.
